attributes.additional_details:
I have hundreds of hours of footage from September right up until today.
There are so many other people across the UK filming on a daily bases of this constant
spraying of poisonous toxins into the very air you all breath..Do some research on youtube and you will be shocked at what you will find..so please help get this petition into Parliament ASAP..
 Here are some of the poisonous toxins they are spraying,barium,nano-particule aluminium,nickel,yellow fungal mycotoxins,cadmium
attributes.background:
I have now been filming multiple planes criss crossing the skies of London,UK spraying poisonous toxins into the ASTOMOPHERE almost everyday.
These "contrails"are in fact chemtrails and contain a multitude of poisonous ingredients.
